H0.text: The rock was once buried under a swamp, the conclusion drawn by a geologist who found several types of seashell fossils in the rock layer.

H1.text: Water from a river washed across the rock is the best conclusion about the rock layer when a geologist found several types of seashell fossils in it.

H2.text: The rock was once sediment at the bottom of an ocean is the best conclusion about the rock layer in which a geologist found several types of seashell fossils.

H3.text: Migrating animals dropped the seashell into the rock is the best conclusion about the rock layer that a geologist found several types of seashell fossils in.

A4.text: It is replete with mollusks, vertebrates, echinoderms, brachiopods, and some groups of arthropods.

A5.text: The fossil record is strongly biased toward organisms with hard parts, leaving most groups of soft-bodied organisms with little to no presence.
